message:
The Army plans to toughen its fitness tests for the first time in 30 years to make sure all soldiers have the strength, endurance and mobility for battle, adding exercises like running an obstacle course in full combat gear and dragging a body

‎"The tests will be given to all soldiers & officers, including Army Reserves & National Guard, even those recalled soldiers who are now 60-years plus, officials said."
